text: Kevin Matthew Fertig (born January 17, 1977) is an American professional wrestler. He is best known for working with World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE) under the ring names, Mordecai and Kevin Thorn. Under the Mordecai name, he played a religious zealot and under his Kevin Thorn name, he played a vampire character along with his manager Ariel. In January 2009, he was offered a new contract with WWE, but turned it down. WWE announced that he was released from contract by request on January 9, even though his contract did not end until April 5 which prevented him from wrestling for other promotions. ==Championships== *Frontier Elite Wrestling **FEW Heavyweight Championship (five times, current) **FEW Deadman's Heavyweight Championship (three times) *Memphis Championship Wrestling **MCW Hardcore Championship (one time) **MCW Southern Heavyweight Championship (one time) **MCW Southern Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Trash) *Memphis Wrestling **Memphis Wrestling Southern Heavyweight Championship (two times) *Ohio Valley Wrestling **OVW Southern Tag Team Championship (one time) (with Travis Bane) ==References== Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Memphis, Tennessee Category:Former WWE wrestlers
